UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Enhanced and equitable availability and use of drinking water, sanitation services and good hygiene practices, especially in identified vulnerable communities for reduced morbidity and mortality among under-5 children and women
